website_summaries.verdict: Designed to release over the course of the day, lessening any side effects.
pros: This supplement is engineered for slow absorption into one's system
Includes vitamin C as well as vitamins B9, B6 and B12
cons: Works best with regular use, multiple times a day

customer_reviews.title: What have they done to this product?
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking these - this particular brand for about 6 years at the request of a naturopathic physician. When I first started taking these I really liked the way they worked. But now they have changed the ingredient list so much - in reference to the added ingredients and they are awful. There is so much "junk" in them and they are a strange light green color and the taste is off. I won't be ordering anymore as I do not feel that they are safe to take. Just too much stuff that is not good. Why do these companies selling natural products put so much stuff that is not good for you.
customer_reviews.author: SMS

customer_reviews.title: Works better than anything for sleep
customer_reviews.text: I'm over 60 and have taken MagSRT about a week. I'm floored. For several years I've had RLS and PLMD and been completely unable to get enough sleep. I've tried: melatonin, valerian, non-time-release magnesiums, magnesium oil, epsom salt baths, magnesium citrate liquid (holding a teaspoon under my tongue had worked better than anything till now). All of these often help but not enough.The first night I tried this Mag SRT I slept well. The second night, too, and the third. It feels like a miracle. Why doesn't everyone know about this? I'm pretty much in gratefulness-shock. I don't even take much, but probably some people will need to.
customer_reviews.author: Jennevans

customer_reviews.title: No More Aching Legs with Time Released Magnesium!
customer_reviews.text: I have been suffering with night leg cramps for quite some time—despite stretching, hydration & alternating heat & ice. I learned from a physician that the body's supply of Magnesium can be lowered when taking certain medications. He suggested a timed release Magnesium supplement. I wanted a high quality supplement to try. I chose this one and the effects are almost immediate. Now the night time continuous leg aching is gone!! I am & will continue to be a regular user of this product. Taken as directed, I have a steady release of Magnesium in my system with no more aches in my legs. Thank you! Deborah G. of PA
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Gibson

customer_reviews.title: This has been amazing for sleep
customer_reviews.text: This has been amazing for sleep. I originally bought it because my naturopathic doctor stated I needed more magnesium for muscle twitching. I started taking it at night and have had deep sleep. I normally have a hard time sleeping and this has helped so much. Doesn't upset my stomach either. My 22 year old daughter has anxiety and she said this has helped a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryll B.

customer_reviews.title: It works for me!
customer_reviews.text: I got the recommendation to try from a facebook advocacy group and boy am I surprised and the effectiveness. I have the energy I missed as a youth and I have improve mental focus leaving me amazed. I have now added this to my daughters regimen to see if it helps with ADD.
customer_reviews.author: Imxnavy2

customer_reviews.title: Best mag supplement for me
customer_reviews.text: This seems to be the best form of magnesium for me. I was taking it for several years, then about a year ago I switched to another brand that was supposed to be even more bio available. I've been having massive problems with chronic muscles knots to the point of seeing a specialist about it. I was assuming I was getting enough magnesium because this brand was supposed to be so good. Then it occurred to me to try switching back to Jigsaw just in case that might help. After a week of being back on it, I can already tell a difference. For me, this appears to be the one and only form my body likes. Thank you Jigsaw!

I only take 1 in the morning with meal and 1 at night after meal. I sleep a lot better and no more cramping legs! Thanks for awesome Product!

customer_reviews.text: I use Jigsaw SRT magnesium to ease gastrointestinal and migraine issues. It isn't a cure, but I have noticeable improvement with it. On one or two occasions, I've neglected to replenish my supply, and I had an increase in negative symptoms--especially with migraine headaches.

customer_reviews.title: Use for Inflammation and Headaches
customer_reviews.text: I've tried various forms of magnesium. Now I ask myself why didn't I listen to the JigSaw Mag reviews a while back. Love the time-release. Overall this is great: does not cause digestive upset, works as overall anti-inflammatory, helps mobility, contributes to overall calmness. I don't feel sleepy when taking it, and I sleep better at night. I still take another type of magnesium that helps better with palpitations, but I take it much less often than prior to taking this time released. JigSaw has quite a few formulas, so rather than order a different one, I've put this on my auto-order.

customer_reviews.title: Works for leg/abdominal/hand cramps also helps with meralgia paresthetica
customer_reviews.text: I several times a week I have painful cramps in my legs/hands/abdomen. I take 1, or sometimes 2, of these tablets and get almost instantaneous relief though a couple of times a month I have to take another dose after a few hours. Occasionally, I will have a short term bought of diarrhea several hours after taking the pill(s). I recently discovered a suggestion on a YouTube that this might help with meralgia paresthetica (numbness and pain on the outside of the thigh). I find that it really does help me—more than heat/ice or exercises. I have been using this for several years and always make sure I have a bottle on hand.
customer_reviews.author: Marham

customer_reviews.title: my favorite
customer_reviews.text: There are lots of mag supplements out there and if you're reading reviews I assume you already know what to look for chemically. So you probably want to know more about quality and these are fantastic. Consistent. And they have a time release so if you need to take mag on the regular you can just take one in the first part of your day and another in the 2nd half and you're pretty much all set. If you need a quick dose these aren't for you. Get a dissolvable supplement, the kind you mix with hot water. They're the best if you need right now relief. But for all day: this is your best choice.

customer_reviews.text: I'm giving this supplement 4 Stars because I appreciate the major effects I'm experiencing from Jigsaw: feeling calm and relaxed without the laxative response that magnesium oxide usually produces. My only problem with the Jigsaw tablets is that you're required to take FOUR per day to achieve a dosage of 500 mgs. I tried to follow those directions but discovered I was having daytime drowsiness! For that reason I began taking TWO tablets--half of the recommended dose--fifteen minutes before bedtime as a way to promote more restful sleep. And it works amazingly! Now I can skip taking melatonin and other herbal, OTC sleep aids!! 💊💊

customer_reviews.title: Raised my magnesium levels
customer_reviews.text: Raised my magnesium levels, which is a good indicator that it contains magnesium that is absorbed into the body. It seems to help with "restless leg", as well, if taken as directed. No complaints, though it is a bit on the expensive side. I guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: S. LEECH

customer_reviews.title: No more cramps or sore muscles!
customer_reviews.text: I partake in ultra distance cycling events as well as strength training, running and rowing. MagSRT has helped tremendously with cramping and sore muscles after training. I’ve been taking it for almost a year and I’m hooked!
customer_reviews.author: Kat Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my wife. It seems to help reduce leg cramps
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Organic supplements are importend to me.
customer_reviews.text: ITS important to me that it's organic. Not taking it long enough to see improvement in my health.
customer_reviews.author: Kaatje

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Take with a good absorbing calcium to maximize absorption and prevent diarrhea.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Consistent and high quality
customer_reviews.text: I use this to help with sleep and a myriad of other benefits that magnesium offers. I like Jigsaw because the quality is consistent and effective.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Coblentz

customer_reviews.title: I can feel the difference
customer_reviews.text: Great customer service and great product. I could literally feel the difference versus other magnesium supplements I’ve tried.
customer_reviews.author: R. White

product_meta.title: MagSRT Magnesium Malate Supplement (Jigsaw Magnesium w/SRT) - Premium, Organic, Slow Release Magnesium Tablets - Easy to Swallow - 120 ct
feature_bullets: SUSTAINED RELEASE TECHNOLOGY: Common magnesium supplements can cause digestive discomforts, due to dumping high doses of magnesium into your body all at once. With Jigsaw MagSRT we provide a unique "time-release" formula that spreads the release of magnesium over an 8 hour period for gentle absorption and maximum effectiveness

CLINICALLY TESTED: The only time-released magnesium supplement with peer-reviewed clinical trial! Shown to increase serum magnesium, increase RBC magnesium, reduce magnesium deficiency symptoms, well-tolerated at high dosage!
HIGH ABSORPTION: Provides a high, yet sustained dosage of 500mg magnesium malate per daily serving (malate form is 85% absorbable). Bound to malic acid, which helps your body create more energy
ConsumerLab.com APPROVED - Independent and Consumer-Focused Laboratory Tested Products
EASY TO SWALLOW: Coated and easy to swallow magnesium tablets that can be easily dissolved in water
